English: What do you like to do in your free time?
French: Qu'aimes-tu faire dans ton temps libre ?

English: I enjoy reading books in my spare time.
French: J'aime lire des livres dans mon temps libre.

English: He is playing soccer with his friends.
French: Il joue au football avec ses amis.

English: She likes to paint and draw.
I watch movies on the weekends.
